h3_39: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center
span_48: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_80: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: We offer core exam courses with physics and diagnostic imaging reviews as well as a physics boot camp to all residents. We offer specialty training tracks in research, quality, informatics and education for residents in the standard four-year training program. Additionally, we offer a five-year clinical scientist training track. For more information regarding our program, contact Radeducation@utsw.edu.

p_354: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
